---
title: "paper2"
description: |
  Reproducing graphs
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
trust <- read_csv(here("research_data", "trust.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
names(trust)
```

```{r}
trust %>%
  tabyl(experiment, response) %>%
  adorn_percentages()
```

```{r}
trust <- trust %>%
  mutate(agegroup = case_when(age_group_participants == 0 ~ "3-5 year olds", 
                              ))
  
```
